title: Best of Lucid Dreaming, Dream Yoga and 'Beyond'.rar
description:
Select files, containing almost 19 books and articles speaking about Dream Yoga and the art of Lucid Dreaming. 

Focusing more on techniques of dream yoga practices and not his metaphysical background, it goes from a tibetan, kashmiri(trika) and hermetic-alchemical perspective on the subject. 

It contains ways(direct and indirect) to induce lucid dreaming and the manipulation of dream content at will and the pre-requisites for it as well.
